org.jslipc.ipc.pipe

Class JslipcPipeServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jslipc.ipc.pipe.JslipcPipeServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeoutAware

    public class JslipcPipeServer
extends Object
implements TimeoutAware
    This is an analogy to a ServerSocket. The method accept() wait for an incoming connection request sent by a JslipcPipeClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JslipcPipeServer(File connectDirectory, File pipesDirectory)
      Creates a JslipcPipeServer supporting all pipe types.
      JslipcPipeServer(File connectDirectory, File pipesDirectory, Class<? extends JslipcPipe>... supportedTypes)
      Creates a JslipcPipeServer working on the given directory.
      JslipcPipeServer(HostDir hostDir)
      Creates a JslipcPipeServer supporting all pipe types.
      JslipcPipeServer(HostDir hostDir, Class<? extends JslipcPipe>... supportedTypes)
      Creates a JslipcPipeServer with given host directory.

      • JslipcPipeServer

        public JslipcPipeServer(HostDir hostDir,
                Class<? extends JslipcPipe>... supportedTypes)
                 throws IOException
        Creates a JslipcPipeServer with given host directory.
        Parameters:
        hostDir - the directory hosting the connect and pipes dir.
        supportedTypes - the pipe types supported by the server, the first one is preferred.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • JslipcPipeServer

        public JslipcPipeServer(File connectDirectory,
                File pipesDirectory)
                 throws IOException
        Creates a JslipcPipeServer supporting all pipe types.
        Parameters:
        connectDirectory - the directory the server searches for incoming connection request.
        pipesDirectory - the directory used to set up pipes.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • JslipcPipeServer

        public JslipcPipeServer(File connectDirectory,
                File pipesDirectory,
                Class<? extends JslipcPipe>... supportedTypes)
                 throws IOException
        Creates a JslipcPipeServer working on the given directory.
        Parameters:
        connectDirectory - the directory the server searches for incoming connection request.
        pipesDirectory - the directory used to set up pipes.
        supportedTypes - the pipe types supported by the server, the first one is preferred.
        Throws:
        IOException
